item.title: A whale deposited 3.26 million USDC into HyperLiquid, opening a 20x long position on BTC and SOL
item.description: On July 25th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale deposited 3.26 million USDC into HyperLiquid and initiated multiple long positions: 20x leveraged positions in BTC and SOL, and 10x leveraged positions in ETH and AAVE.

item.title: Galaxy Digital once again Deposits 2850 Bitcoins to CEX
item.description: On July 25th, according to Arkham Monitor, Galaxy Digital once more transferred 2850 bitcoins to CEX just 8 minutes ago.

item.title: AguilaTrades has been liquidated again on a 720 Bitcoin long position
item.description: On July 25th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, AguilaTrades was once again liquidated for a long position of 720 bitcoins. Their total loss has now exceeded 36 million US dollars.

item.title: New BitMine Chairman, Fundstrat Co-Founder: Compared to Circle's valuation, an Ethereum price increase to $15,000 is a reasonable level
item.description: On July 25th, the newly appointed Chairman of BitMine, Tom Lee, who is a co-founder of Fundstrat, stated in an interview with CoinDesk this week. If we refer to Circle's current valuation level (130 times EBITDA, a financial metric that measures a company's operating performance), then it is completely reasonable for Ethereum to rise to $15,000.Furthermore, Tom Lee expressed agreement with analyst Mark Newton's view that "Ethereum will break $4,000 by the end of the month."It is worth noting that the latest data shows that Bitmine Immersion Tech (BMNR) currently holds 566,800 ETH, which is worth about $2.1 billion. In the last 30 days, the company's position has increased by 247.41%. The company announced the appointment of Tom Lee as Chairman on June 30th.

item.title: Binance Alpha will support Pundi AI (PUNDIAI) Contract Swap
item.description: On July 25th, as per official channels, Binance Alpha will provide support for the Pundi AI (PUNDIAI) contract swap. Binance will commence the suspension of PUNDIAI trading starting from 03:35 UTC on July 25th and will cancel all outstanding orders.

item.title: Blueport Interactive Founder Wang Feng: The institutionalization of Bitcoin and Ethereum is a trend, and stablecoins will penetrate all industries.
item.description: July 25th - Wang Feng, the founder of Blue Harbor Interactive (@wangfeng_0128), elucidated the impetus for establishing LK Crypto. Wang Feng pointed out that the institutionalization of Bitcoin and Ethereum is a prevailing trend. Stablecoins will inevitably enter all enterprises or specific industries sooner or later. Stock tokenization will not merely merge coins and stocks but ultimately treat stocks as coins.Furthermore, Wang Feng predicted that the subsequent step will be that every enterprise, not limited to public companies, will form a crypto business team. Market and technical talents in the cryptocurrency field will be fiercely competed for with high salaries similar to those of AI talents.On July 16th, Blue Harbor Interactive established the LK Crypto division to supervise the company's mainstream crypto assets and expedite its Web3 and RWA layout.

item.title: Galaxy Digital has withdrawn 200 million USDT from a CEX in the last 15 minutes, potentially indicating a partial completion of a Bitcoin sell-off.
item.description: On July 25th, according to on-chain data, Galaxy Digital withdrew 200 million USDT from a CEX within approximately 15 minutes, which may suggest a partial sell-off of Bitcoin.Previously, Galaxy Digital had transferred more than 10,000 BTC to CEXs in less than 8 hours.

item.title: Hyperliquid Whale Watch: In the last 1 hour, multiple whale accounts have deleveraged. Over the past 24 hours, 2 whale accounts have collectively withdrawn $99 million.
item.description: On July 25th, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight accessible at https://app.hyperliquid.xyz/join/NTOD, changes in the holdings of multiple whale accounts came to light. Several whale short positions witnessed a reduction, and two whale accounts withdrew a combined total of 99 million USD within the past 24 hours. The details are as follows:The whale account beginning with 0x162cc decreased its SOL long position by 24,056.29 tokens, with the liquidation price shifting from 85.582 to 17.435;The whale account starting with 0x20c2d trimmed its ETH short position by 817,411 USD. The current profit and loss (P&L) stands at -18,967,311.82, and the current liquidation price is 4,899.785 USD;The whale account beginning with 0x880ac reduced its ETH short position by 1,153,741 USD. The current P&L is -12,912,367.65, and the current liquidation price is 4,791.017 USD;The whale account starting with 0x5d2f4 decreased its BTC short position by 1,617,326 USD. The current P&L is -7,891,790

item.title: Crypto Market Platform CoinWings has now launched the WLFI-exclusive airdrop event.
item.description: On July 25th, according to the official news from CoinWings, the cryptocurrency market platform CoinWings has officially initiated a 1-million WLFI exclusive airdrop event for Pro users. The event has now commenced, and users who subscribe to the annual membership can obtain up to 720 WLFI airdrop rewards. This airdrop will conclude on December 31, 2025, and the rewards will be distributed uniformly after WLFI begins trading.CoinWings is an AI-driven cryptocurrency market and intelligence platform that offers on-chain AI signals, whale/whale tracking, technical analysis, listing monitoring, and a variety of practical trading tools. With the aid of large-scale model capabilities, it provides users with more professional, timely, and comprehensive market information support.

item.title: Statistics: Over the past 8 hours, Galaxy Digital has cumulatively transferred over 10,000 bitcoins to a CEX and still holds 27,127 bitcoins.
item.description: On July 25th, as per the monitoring of LookIntoBitcoin, Galaxy Digital has transferred more than 10,000 BTC to a CEX within less than 8 hours. These bitcoins belong to a Bitcoin whale from the Satoshi era.As of the moment of writing, the sending address from Galaxy Digital still retains 27,127 BTC.
